intro: Neodregea, commonly known as the African moonflower, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Apocynaceae. It consists of several species, most of which are native to southern Africa. These plants are typically shrubs or small trees, characterized by their opposite, simple leaves and showy, fragrant flowers.
